titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of April 25 through April 29, 2022, as "National Specialized Instructional Support Personnel Appreciation Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of April 25 through April 29, 2022, as "National Specialized Instructional Support Personnel Appreciation Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Specialized Instructional Support Personnel Appreciation Week.
